Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black with two added white bands; exterior: painted decoration consisting of part of lion’s head and mane, to right.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 287, no. 836, pl. 117)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1121) (phase 2)
